news.title: ALMA Views Fomalhaut Star System in Never-Before-Seen Detail
news.summary: Composite image of the Fomalhaut star system. The ALMA data, shown in orange, reveal the distant and eccentric debris disk in never-before-seen detail.

news.title: Icy ring around young planetary system has similar chemical fingerprint to our solar system
news.summary: Earlier observations of the star, known as Fomalhaut and located 25 light years from Earth, were taken in 2012 by astronomers using the Atacama Large Millimetre/submillimetre Array (ALMA), located in Chile.

news.title: ALMA Provides First Complete Image of Fomalhaut’s Debris Disk | Astronomy | Sci-News.com
news.summary: Using the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA), astronomers have made the first complete millimeter-wavelength image of the ring of dusty debris surrounding the young star Fomalhaut, and found that the ice content of colliding…

news.title: ALMA Eyes Icy Ring Around Young Planetary System
news.summary: Composite image of the Fomalhaut star system. The ALMA data, shown in orange, reveal the distant and eccentric debris disk in never-before-seen detail.

news.title: ALMA eyes icy ring around young planetary system
news.summary: An international team of astronomers using the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA) has made the first complete millimeter-wavelength image of the ring of dusty debris surrounding the young star Fomalhaut.

news.title: ALMA eyes icy ring around young planetary system
news.summary: ALMA eyes icy ring around young planetary system by Staff Writers Charlottesville VA (SPX) May 19, 2017 An international team of astronomers using the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA) has made the first complete millimeter-wavelengt…

news.title: Кометы Фомальгаута похожи на кометы Солнечной системы
news.summary: При помощи большого радиотелескопа ALMA астрономы получили снимок диска из космической пыли, окружающего молодую звезду Фомальгаут, и узнали, что содержание льда в кометах, вращающихся в этом облаке, весьма близко к составу комет в Солнечной системе.

news.title: ALMA Sees Ring Of Icy Debris Around A Young Star System 25 Light-Years Away
news.summary: A young star system about 25 light-years away from Earth has a well-defined band of icy rubble and gas around it, which is likely a result of exocomets colliding into each other near the edges of the system.

news.title: ALMA Eyes Icy Ring Around Young Planetary System
news.summary: An international team of astronomers using the Atacama Large Millimeter/submillimeter Array (ALMA) has made the first complete millimeter-wavelength image of the ring of dusty debris surrounding the young star Fomalhaut.

news.title: Icy ring around young planetary system has similar chemical fingerprint to our solar system
news.summary: An international team of astronomers, including researchers from the University of Cambridge, has made the most detailed image of the ring of dusty debris surrounding a young star and found that the ice content of colliding comets within it is…

news.title: Star's Comet-Like Icy Debris Ring Captured in New Video, Images
news.summary: A ring of icy debris in a young, nearby planetary system resembles comets found in our own solar system, new images reveal.

news.title: Se completa la imagen del disco de escombros de Fomalhaut
news.summary: Imagen compuesta del sistema estelar Fomalhaut. La información tomada por ALMA se muestra en color naranjo.
